attributes.action: To reduce the spread of Covid-19, ask those who can to work from home.
attributes.additional_details: Delays around the globe in the 'delay' phase are costing lives, and accelerating the unnecessary spread of the virus. Social-distancing is improving the situation in China and is being praised by the WHO as a step being taken in Italy. Together individuals taking responsible action will help beat coronavirus.
attributes.background: To reduce the spread of Covid-19, ask those who can to work from home. This should include anyone who is able to work from home with minimal or only minor disruption.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301439.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
